mapper.insert: insert into tb_user(user_email, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_zip, user_addr1, user_addr2, user_gender, user_birth, user_phone) values(#{user_email},#{user_id},#{user_pw},#{user_name},#{user_zip},#{user_addr1},#{user_addr2},#{user_gender},#{user_birth},#{user_phone})
